name: Spinlanders
description:
>>> Spin your way to adventure! <<<
Spinlanders is a brand new game that brings exciting and unique gameplay to slots like never before!

Explore the magical realm of Spinland and amass riches! Then use these riches to upgrade your character for more powerful spins. Play slots in a brand new way by spinning to squash monsters, earn loot, and defeat the evil that has risen. Meet zany characters and explore the many worlds of Spinland!

Features:
- Easy to play with depth for player control
- Always guaranteed Free Spins!
- Items and Upgrades to swing odds in your favor
- Multi-Line spins, Holdable Icons, and Massive Scatter Matches!
- Fun and colorful graphics, animations, and sounds

Explore:
- Over 30 stages of monsters, bosses, and riches! (With updates to come!)
- 5 unlockable characters that provide unique bonuses
- Multiples ways to upgrade your character - Forge your unique hero!
- Fun Mini-Games to upgrade your stats
- Win gold, gems, or items from the Prize shop!


Studio Info:
Backup Entertainment is a small independent studio comprised of two passionate developers.
Coder: Albert | Artist: Johnathan | With help from Musician: The Mananquil

Contact us:
@backupent
facebook.com/backupent
backupent@gmail.com

Built proudly with the Cocos2d Engine/Tiled Map Editor/Spine
